messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Fw:
messages.msgSnippet: O Keefe  wrote: Hello, I did some searching around and could not find the exact meaning of seven troubles and eight pains but, I can tell
messages.messageBody:
O'Keefe <Viva77@...> wrote:
Hello,

I did some searching around and could not find the exact meaning of "seven troubles and eight pains" but, I can tell you what he meant. That is part of a buddhist prayer inviting the gods to put the problems or suffering of the amako family on him. He said this as a loyal retainer vowing to help his lords family.

In buddhism they often list things in groups for easy memorization. Such as the eightfold path or the 4 noble truths. Perhaps these are part of a list, but I could not find these lists in the short search I did. Sorry

Musashi
-----Original Message-----
From: O'Keefe <viva77@...>
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Monday, December 31, 2001 10:07 AM


Yamanaka Shika-no-Suke Retainer of the Amako fam. prayed to the new moon Grant and bestow on me the 7 fold troubles and the 8 pains what are these? thanks happy new year


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Fw:
messages.msgSnippet: ... Grant and bestow on me the 7 fold troubles and the 8 pains what are these? thanks happy new year happy new year to you too.. I do not know much but it
messages.messageBody:
>Yamanaka Shika-no-Suke Retainer of the Amako fam. prayed to the new moon
Grant >and bestow on me the 7 fold troubles and the 8 pains what are these?
thanks >happy new year

happy new year to you too.. I do not know much but it sounds rather tied to
chinaish, in china the tai chi martial, the pa qua and the lao ba jann,
arts founds themselves on the theories that talks about 8 doors...
(basically 8 weak points in the defenses of the enemy and how to use them)
and the 8 pieces of silk (how to prevent the 8 doors) maybe it has
something related to that?
7 fold troubles tho sounds the name of a legendary sword to me.
